variants: integrate(x - sum(1/(1+x)**n for n in range(1, 10)), (x, -1, 0))
integrate((1/2) * sin(x + π/2), (x, -1, 0))  # sin(x + π/2) = cos(x)
integrate((x**3 - x)/3, (x, -1, 0))  # (This looks similar but follows the series format, observable during simplifications later.)
integrate(1/3 * sum((x - 0)**k for k in range(3)), (x, -1, 0))
integrate(1 - y, (x, -1, 0)) using the relation \(-1 \leq y \leq 1\)
integrate(-sin^2(a * x) + sin^2(a * x)/(1 - cos(a * x)), (x, -1, 0))
integrate((-x)**2 * sum((-1)**n * x**n for n in range(100)), x)
integrate((-x)**2 * sum((x**n) for n in range(1, 10)), x)
